name: part_007
file: tmp_【#夜明けのBJライブ】Blue Journey 1st Live「夜明けのうた」【無料チラ見せ】 [WdNKKc_etZ0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Shirogane Noel delivers a monologue about personal struggles.
Nakiri Ayame continues the monologue, reflecting on human nature.
Amano Kanata speaks about the pain of daily life and emotions.
Shishiro Botan expresses self-hatred and frustration with the world.
Himemori Luna reflects on lost opportunities and separation.
Minato Aqua, Tsunomaki Watame, and Houshou Marine perform the song 'Hitorida'.

subtitles.original: 悩んだり
subtitles.english: Worrying,

subtitles.original: 嘘をついたり
subtitles.english: lying,

subtitles.original: 強がったり
subtitles.english: acting tough,

subtitles.original: 素直になれなかったり
subtitles.english: not being able to be honest,

subtitles.original: 迷ったり
subtitles.english: getting lost,

subtitles.original: 信じなかったり
subtitles.english: not believing,

subtitles.original: 矛盾したり
subtitles.english: contradicting,

subtitles.original: 言えなかったり
subtitles.english: not being able to say it,

subtitles.original: 傷つけあったり
subtitles.english: hurting each other,

subtitles.original: 無くしてしまったり
subtitles.english: losing things,

subtitles.original: 気づかないふりをしたり
subtitles.english: pretending not to notice.

subtitles.original: どうしてそんなことをするんだろう。
subtitles.english: I wonder why we do such things.

subtitles.original: ただ一緒にいたいだけなのに
subtitles.english: Even though I just want to be with you,

subtitles.original: ただ好きでいたいだけなのに
subtitles.english: even though I just want to keep loving you,

subtitles.original: ただ楽しくいたいだけなのに
subtitles.english: even though I just want to have fun.

subtitles.original: 繰り返す日々に感情がすり潰されて
subtitles.english: My emotions are worn down by the repeating days,

subtitles.original: 行ったり来たりする毎日に嫌気がさして
subtitles.english: and I'm sick of the days going back and forth.

subtitles.original: 怒りをぶつける言い訳にいつも誰かを使ったりしてる
subtitles.english: I'm always using someone as an excuse to vent my anger.

subtitles.original: そんな人間が嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate people like that.

subtitles.original: そんな世界が嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate a world like that.

subtitles.original: そんなあいつらが大嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate those people.

subtitles.original: そんな僕も大嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate myself too.

subtitles.original: 大嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate it all.

subtitles.original: 大嫌いなはずなのに
subtitles.english: I'm supposed to hate it,

subtitles.original: 壊してしまうのが怖かった
subtitles.english: but I was afraid of breaking it.

subtitles.original: 守りたかったはずなのに
subtitles.english: I was supposed to want to protect it,

subtitles.original: 傷つくことが怖かった
subtitles.english: but I was afraid of getting hurt.

subtitles.original: 大好きだったはずなのに
subtitles.english: I was supposed to love it,

subtitles.original: 離れ離れになってしまった
subtitles.english: but we've become separated.

subtitles.original: あの時 声を上げていれば
subtitles.english: If I had raised my voice then,

subtitles.original: あの時 話し合っていれば
subtitles.english: if we had talked things over then,

subtitles.original: あの時 ちゃんと伝えていれば
subtitles.english: if I had conveyed it properly then,

subtitles.original: 何かが変わっただろうか
subtitles.english: would something have changed?

subtitles.original: これは そんな僕の物語
subtitles.english: This is my story.

subtitles.original: 愛想笑いで誤魔化してた 本当のこと言えなかった
subtitles.english: I was hiding it with a fake smile, I couldn't tell the truth.

subtitles.original: 大切なものを見落とした 僕は独りだ
subtitles.english: I overlooked what was important, I am alone.

subtitles.original: 敷かれたレールの 上を走って
subtitles.english: Running on top of the laid out rails,

subtitles.original: またほら今日も 同じ道
subtitles.english: look, it's the same road again today.

subtitles.original: 通り過ぎてゆく 景色を見て
subtitles.english: Looking at the scenery passing by,

subtitles.original: 自分から目を逸らす
subtitles.english: I look away from myself.

subtitles.original: そうじゃない
subtitles.english: That's not it.

subtitles.original: こんなはずじゃなかったなぁ
subtitles.english: It wasn't supposed to be like this.

subtitles.original: そうだろ そうだろ 言い聞かせてた
subtitles.english: Right? Right? I kept telling myself.

subtitles.original: 不安定さ
subtitles.english: Unsteadiness.

subtitles.original: 後悔の連続ばかりで 失ってばかりなんだ
subtitles.english: Just a series of regrets, I'm just losing things.

subtitles.original: 失敗も後悔も全部 やり直したいのに
subtitles.english: Failure, regret, everything, I want to start over,

subtitles.original: 失って初めて気づいた 与えられてばかりの僕だ
subtitles.english: but I only realized after losing it, I've just been given everything.

subtitles.original: ああ だから僕は独りだ
subtitles.english: Ah, that's why I'm alone.

subtitles.original: あの日の後悔が 今日もよぎる
subtitles.english: That day's regret crosses my mind today too.

subtitles.original: 今でもずっと 繰り返し
subtitles.english: Even now, over and over.

subtitles.original: 窓辺の景色に 思いを留めて
subtitles.english: Keeping my thoughts on the scenery by the window,

subtitles.original: 日常に目を逸らす
subtitles.english: I look away from everyday life.

subtitles.original: いつまで
subtitles.english: Until when?

subtitles.original: ずっとこのままなの？
subtitles.english: Will it be like this forever?

subtitles.original: どうして どうして 分かり合えずに
subtitles.english: Why? Why? Without being able to understand each other,

subtitles.original: いつまでも
subtitles.english: forever.

subtitles.original: 失敗の連続ばかりで 間違ってばかりなんだ
subtitles.english: Just a series of failures, I'm just making mistakes.

subtitles.original: 人生も関係も全部 やり直したいのに
subtitles.english: Life, relationships, everything, I want to start over,

subtitles.original: 間違って初めて気づいた 諦めてばかりの僕だ
subtitles.english: but I only realized after making mistakes, I've just been giving up.

subtitles.original: ああ だから今もこのまま
subtitles.english: Ah, that's why I'm still like this.

subtitles.original: 救いさえ 灰になる
subtitles.english: Even salvation turns to ash.

subtitles.original: 霞んでゆく過去 傷口と幻
subtitles.english: The fading past, wounds and illusions.

subtitles.original: 痛みも忘れてしまうなら
subtitles.english: If I'm going to forget the pain too,

subtitles.original: 思い出すよ ここにあったと だから僕
subtitles.english: I'll remember, that it was here, that's why I...
